item.title: Brown shooting manhunt continues as mayor urges people to share tips
item.description: Authorities released a person of interest after determining that the evidence "points in a different direction."

item.title: Brown University shooting victims identified
item.description: The two people who were killed in a shooting at Brown Universityâ€‹ on Saturday have been identified as students Ella Cook and Mukhammad Aziz Umurzokov.
